name: sea surface height
dataset_description: Parameters include dynamic sea surface height [SSH], sea surface height without the inverse barometer (IB) correction from atmospheric pressure loading [SSHNOIBC], and the IB correction from atmospheric pressure loading [SSHIBC]. The sea surface height fields include corrections for global mean steric height associated with global mean density changes in the Boussinesq volume-conserving model (i.e., the Greatbatch correction) and for sea-ice pressure loading.

name: ocean bottom pressure
dataset_description: Parameters include ocean bottom pressure with and without the contribution from atmospheric pressure loading [OBPGMAP, OBP], their anomalies with respect to 2005-2010 means [OBPGMAPA, OBPAnoma]. Note: ocean bottom pressure fields are provided in terms of equivalent water height.

name: ocean and sea-ice surface freshwater fluxes
fields: EXFpreci, EXFevap, EXFroff, EXFempmr, SIatmFW, SIacSubl, SIrsSubl, SIfwThru, SIsnPrcp, oceFWflx, SFLUX
dataset_description: Parameters include freshwater flxues from precipitation, evaporation, runoff, and sublimation across the air/ocean interface [EXFpreci, EXFevap, EXFroff, EXFempmr] and air/sea-ice interface [SIatmFW, SIacSubl, SIrsSubl, SIfwThru, SIsnPrcp]; and total freshwater fluxes across the ocean surface [oceFWflx, SFLUX].

name: ocean and sea-ice surface heat fluxes
fields: EXFhl, EXFhs, EXFlwdn, EXFswdn, EXFqnet, oceQnet, SIatmQnt, TFLUX, EXFswnet, EXFlwnet, oceQsw, SIaaflux
dataset_description: Parameters include latent, sensible, and short- and longwave radiative heat fluxes across the air/ocean interface [EXFhl, EXFhs, EXFlwdn, EXFlwnet, EXFswdn, EXFswnet, EXFqnet] and air/sea-ice interface [SIatmQnt, SIaaflux]; and total net heat fluxes across the ocean surface [oceQnet, oceQsw, TFLUX].

name: atmosphere surface state
fields: EXFatemp, EXFaqh, EXFpress, EXFewind, EXFnwind, EXFwspee
dataset_description: Parameters include atmosphere temperature [EXFatemp], humidity [EXFaqh], pressure [EXFpress], meridional and zonal winds [EXFewind, EXFnwind], and total wind speed [EXFwspee].

name: ocean and sea-ice surface stress
dataset_description: Parameters include surface wind stress at the top of the ocean and sea-ice [EXFtaue, EXFtaun] and total ocean surface stress [oceTAUE, oceTAUN] in the zonal and meridional directions. Total ocean surface stress includes contributions from winds and sea-ice drag.

name: sea-ice and snow concentration and thickness
dataset_description: Parameters include sea-ice concentration [SIarea], grid-cell averaged sea-ice and snow thickness [SIheff, SIhsnow], and sea-ice pressure loading [sIceLoad].

name: sea-ice velocity
dataset_description: Parameters include sea-ice velocity in the zonal and meridional directions [SIuice, SIvice].

name: ocean temperature and salinity
dataset_description: Parameters include seawater potential temperature [THETA] and salinity [SALT].

name: ocean density, stratification, and hydrostatic pressure
dataset_description: Parameters include seawater density [RHOAnoma], vertical stratification [DRHODR], and hydrostatic pressure on the model's time-varying vertical coordinate [PHIHYD].

name: ocean velocity
dataset_description: Parameters include ocean velocity in the zonal, meridional, and vertical directions [EVEL, NVEL, WVEL].

name: Gent-McWilliams ocean bolus velocity
dataset_description: Parameters include the Gent-McWilliams ocean bolus velocity in the zonal, meridional, and vertical directions [EVELSTAR, NVELSTAR, WVELSTAR].

name: ocean three-dimensional parameterized mixing coefficients
dataset_description: Parameters include the time-invariant, three-dimensional coefficients for vertical diffusivity [DIFFKR], Gent-McWilliams cross-isopycnal diffusivity [KAPGM], and Redi along-isopycnal diffusivity [KAPREDI].
